content.question: Let <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the function defined by <math alttext="f of x, equals, x to the fifth power, minus 10 times x cubed " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>. The graph of <math alttext="f prime" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>, the derivative of <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, is shown above. On which of the following intervals is the graph of <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> concave up?

choices.label: <math alttext="x is less than the negative of the square root of 3 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="0 is less than x, which is less than the square root of 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the negative of the square root of 3, is less than x, which is less than 0 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="x is greater than the square root of 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="x is less than the negative of the square root of 6 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext=" x is greater than the square root of 6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the negative of the square root of 6, is less than x, which is less than the square root of 6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the negative of the square root of 3, is less than x, which is less than 0 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="x is greater than the square root of 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 5.6: Determining Concavity of Functions over Their Domains

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
